name: num::nonzero::NonZero::<u64>::reverse_bits

num::nonzero::NonZero::<T>::get.doc: Returns the contained value as a primitive type.

num::<impl u64>::reverse_bits.doc:
Reverses the order of bits in the integer. The least significant bit becomes the most significant bit,
                 second least-significant bit becomes second most-significant bit, etc.

 # Examples

 ```
 let m = n.reverse_bits();

 ```

num::nonzero::NonZero::<T>::new_unchecke.doc:
Creates a non-zero without checking whether the value is non-zero.
 This results in undefined behavior if the value is zero.

 # Safety

 The value must not be zero.
